|brand = Creator |model = Ci20 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V2a |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 22, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Creator_Ci20 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = X280073 |icid = 8864A-0073 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ingenic;JZ4780; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = r2 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;29F64G08CBAAA;MT29F64G08CBAAA; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G0846Q-BCK0; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Davicom;DM9000C; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D0:31:10 |oui = 04:E6:76
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.10;; |stockos = Linux;3.0.8;Debian 7;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J57 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J58
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4, Audio in/out (3.5mm), IR receiver, RTC |addchip = Advanced PMU;Active-Semi;ACT8600;;1;,,, I2C Real-time Clock;Pericom;PT7C4337UE;;1;,,, Audio Jack Detection Switch;Fairchild;FSA8049;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/21/2015 |estreldate = 05/2015 |estprice = 65 |upc = 759454828516 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
